price: Nígbà náà, wọn kò níí lè sọ àsọọ́lẹ̀ kan. Wọn kò sì níí lè padà sí ọ̀dọ̀ ará ilé wọn.
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
